dct_title_s: A plan of the city of New York in the yeare [sic] 1664 : compiled from olde maps & documents showing land grants
dct_description_sm: Selected buildings shown pictorially.; Shows land ownership, with overlay of modern street locations and names.; Includes index of points of interest, with descriptions and brief histories; official seals of New Netherland, New York City, New Amsterdam, and New York state; flags flying over New York over time.
